name: name-visibiliy
objective: Name of available services are visible
description: The available services must be visible on UI
author: sdx

name: security-icon
objective: Security icon of a service is visible
description: Security icon of a service must be visible on UI

steps.expected: every secure service must have an associated security icon

author: sdx

name: signal-strength-icon
description: Where appliable, the signal strength must be displayed in UI

steps.expected: every Wifi service must have a strength indicator

author: sdx

name: wifi-join-open
objective: An unsecured wifi network can be reached
description: An open wifi service can be accessed.
pre_condition:
- connman UI is opened
- wifi technology is enabled
- an open wifi service must be available

steps.description: double click on the open service (SSID)
steps.expected: connection to the service must be established

author: sdx

name: wifi-join-wep
objective: A wep secured wifi network can be reached
description: An wifi service secured by WEP can be accessed.
pre_condition:
- connman UI is opened
- wifi technology is enabled
- a wifi service secured by WEP must be available

steps.description: double click on the WEP service (SSID)
steps.expected: connection to the service must be established

author: sdx

name: wifi-join-wpa
objective: A wpa secured wifi network can be reached
description: A wifi service secured by WPA can be accessed.
pre_condition:
- connman UI is opened
- wifi technology is enabled
- a wifi service secured by WPA must be available

steps.description: double click on the WPA service (SSID)
steps.expected: connection to the service must be established

author: sdx
